creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure in heavy dress standing with large staff in PL hand, dagger at PR waist; large jars and a bag of root vegetables at feet; banner over the top in German
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Stamp

inscribed in plat monogram in plate, upper right: [HSB]
provenance: Ducs d'Arenberg; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Market Peasant: Deten wir verkaufen
